entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 24 this evening. Forecast issued 5:48 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Periods of snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 5:48 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Clearing in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:48 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023
